name: A Short Hop to the Moon
name_original: A Short Hop to the Moon
description:
Guide your frog into space using your trusty spaceship. Avoid raindrops and remember to shoot air into your balloon!

Controls:

  • A,D - left, right
  • Space - jump
  • LMB - Shoot bubbles

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 game jam!
